TopicTitle: Targeted landing in atmosphere, navigating the last couple km

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to land a reentered stage, and using the Trajectories mod I can get within a couple km of the target. Fine-tuning and landing is eluding me,

Are there any methods/mods that makes this easier/possible? I've tried using MechJeb, but atmospheric braking throws it far off.

Wings and control surfaces. Once you're down in the thicker air you fly to a point directly over your destination and open a parachute or three. Your RV has to resemble a spaceplane to some extent -- which makes things easier if you have some practice landing spaceplanes.

Practice makes perfect, but Trajectories and Throttle Controlled Avionics is a powerful combo for re-entering first stages Space-X style.

SM

You can drop your object in a powered fairing, stop horizontal speed almost completly above your target spot, eject fairing, descentengine, deploy chutes, there you are. Works.
